abstract: St Andrews Golf Club closes the Old Course to golfing on Sundays, and invites visitors to stroll historic grounds, along with their children and pets; Sunday play is permitted a few times a year for a handful of tournaments, including British Open.
lead_paragraph: Visitors may find it odd that the course is closed to golfing on a weekend day, but the edict is a sacred part of the course’s traditions.

headline.main: Sundays on the Old Course at St. Andrews: No Golfers Allowed
headline.print_headline: Sundays on the Old Course at St. Andrews: No Golfers Allowed

snippet: Visitors may find it odd that the course is closed to golfing on a weekend day, but the edict is a sacred part of the course’s traditions.
